A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unfortunately\, this is the worst Star Wars movie ever released and also the absolute worst two and a half hour long movie I have ever watched in my life. Even if this movie wasn't Star Wars and was some stand alone movie\, I would have the same opinion. It is so disappointing. I had no expectations going into the movie\, but it was just so horrible I couldn't wait for it to be over about half way in.
